amendment.description: Amendment ensures that $11 million in funding within the Farm Service Agency goes towards the Emergency Conservation Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $11 million in funding within the Farm Service Agency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. McNerney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
